net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_updateTemp
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Set the temporary hit points on a token with these parameters in JSON: { "id": Id of the token taking damage, "temporary": The token's current temporary hit points "updateTemp": The new amount of temporary hit points } The temporary hit points are set to the larger of current and new values These token properties must be set: HP, MaxHP, DSPass, DSFail The Exhaustion 6 state should also be set. After applying the damage this macro calls dnd5e_applyHealth
